Careers | Support ACV’s Ministry | Visit Us 386-658-3333 Brand and toggle get grouped for better mobile display Toggle navigation Brand Living Options Home Ownership Rental Homes Manufactured Homes Income-Based Rentals Assisted Living Skilled Nursing Rate Sheet Lifestyle Dining Activities Our Location Spiritual Life Support Services Health Services Skilled Nursing Memory Support Outpatient Services Home Care All Resources News Village Streams Podcasts About Us Ministry is the Mission Affiliations Careers Campus Map The Village Church Contact Us Careers Support ACV’s Ministry Visit Us Home > Health Services > Memory Support Memory Support: Alzheimer’s and Dementia Care Specialized Alzheimer’s & Dementia Care Looking for memory care in North Florida? Advent Christian Village’s skilled nursing facility, Good Samaritan Center, is an excellent option to consider. We provide the highest date standards of care for persons needing memory support. It’s our belief that quality memory care grants residents opportunities to experience supervised but meaningful independence. Good Samaritan Center’s design and adjoining outdoor courtyards permit members to move about in protected freedom that is both safe and enjoyable. Our professional, compassionate staff works to provide each of our residents the meaningful life they deserve in a vibrant, caring community. Restorative & Rehabilitative Services The goal of our senior care services is to encourage residents to live a full life. If a loved one requires intensive rehabilitative services following a stroke or surgery, Advent Christian Village provides the right amount of care to return him or her to their highest level of function. Admissions Standards To be admitted to Good Samaritan Center, a person must be at least 60 years of age and meet the state of Florida nursing home admission guidelines as ordered by a physician. Artists of Dementia Care The state of Florida requires that Advent Christian Village employees working directly with members at Good Samaritan Center obtain a certain number of hours of training relating to Alzheimer’s disease and other forms of dementia. Advent Christian Village gladly fulfills that obligation and also invests time in additional training. A number of years ago, Good Samaritan Center developed an intensive training program on dementia and Alzheimer’s care that all staff members are required to complete. This training is based on the book “The Art of Dementia Care.” Once an employee goes through that program and graduates, they become what we call an Artist of Dementia Care. Our training program changes how employees think about people in need of Alzheimer’s and dementia care. It also teaches each staff member how to better help the families of those suffering with memory loss. Myrtis & Sandra, Artist of Dementia Care Art of Dementia Care Program VP of Health Services Keri Hilliard Explains the Art of Dementia Care Program Explore Personalized Memory Support Options If your loved one is in need of memory care, Advent Christian Village offers senior care services that are built with their needs in mind. For more information about how Advent Christian Village senior living community can help your loved one dealing with dementia, call 1-800-647-3353 or contact us today.

Careers | Support ACV’s Ministry | Visit Us 386-658-3333 Brand and toggle get grouped for better mobile display Toggle navigation Brand Living Options Home Ownership Rental Homes Manufactured Homes Income-Based Rentals Assisted Living Skilled Nursing Rate Sheet Lifestyle Dining Activities Our Location Spiritual Life Support Services Health Services Skilled Nursing Memory Support Outpatient Services Home Care All Resources News Village Streams Podcasts About Us Ministry is the Mission Affiliations Careers Campus Map The Village Church Contact Us Careers Support ACV’s Ministry Visit Us Home > About Us About Advent Christian Village Where Independence Meets Healthy Living. Discover vibrant and healthful senior living in North Florida Advent Christian Village is a senior living community for those 55 years or older. Located on 1,200 acres along the Suwannee River, our community offers a variety of housing options including home ownership, rental apartments, and HUD-subsidized apartments. Our continuum of care features a clinic, home care, rehabilitation, assisted living and skilled nursing options. A healthy and meaningful life is the foundation of everything Advent Christian Village offers. Our educational, physical, spiritual, artistic and social opportunities are designed to enhance the golden years of life. Our vibrant community offers dining, shops, creative studios, a house of worship, guest accommodations and a state-of-the-art medical center. Buildings are peacefully situated among trees and lakes, away from traffic and noise. More Than Just a Senior Living Community Along with serving senior adults, Advent Christian Village has a heart for serving families with special needs and children. We provide a variety of ministries, including lending a helping hand to families with special needs, offering on-campus retreats and mentorships for foster children, and hands-on leadership training for high school students. The mission of Advent Christian Village is to express Christ’s love by providing compassionate care and quality comprehensive services for senior adults, families with special needs, and children in a secure, supportive residential setting and in the surrounding communities. Our Core Values: C.H.E.R.I.S.H. Compassion: We will put ourselves in the other person’s position and treat them with kindness and respect, giving them the dignity that we would desire. Honesty: We will be truthful in all we say and do. Excellence: As representatives of Christ, we will strive for the highest standard, maintaining consistent quality in all we do. Respect for the dignity of the individual: We will uphold each person’s value and self-esteem in the way we deal with them. Integrity: We will be dependable and keep our promises. Support: We will be tireless advocates for the well-being and dignity of those we serve. Held accountable and trusted: We will submit to a system of checks and balances, whereby we are answerable for our actions, in the quality of our services and in our financial dealings. What Makes Us Different So what makes Advent Christian Village such a popular option for senior living in the region? Through the years, we have been leaders in developing innovative solutions for retirement living and healthcare. Today, we remain dedicated to providing quality, comprehensive services with compassion. Advent Christian Village offers a strong spirit of community where residents care for one another and independence is encouraged to live life fully. Our members enjoy enduring friendships, a sense of security and the unique spirit of a dedicated, caring community. If you are looking for a meaningful senior life before and during retirement, Advent Christian Village may be just the place. Come and see our senior living community for yourself. We’d love to show you around. To learn more about Advent Christian Village’s rich history or for more information about our community, contact us today to schedule a tour! ACV Health – An Outreach of Advent Christian Village Through ACV Health , our mission is to provide comprehensive medical care in a convenient and welcoming environment. We believe in a relationship-first model of healthcare, which means you are more than just a name on an intake form. When you walk into our offices, our care providers value your time – and greet you by name. Our services range from primary and specialty care to rehabilitation and home health . Through our partner providers at Copeland Medical Center , we also offer family dentistry, audiology, podiatry and more. Learn More
Click Here to Give >>>

Careers | Support ACV’s Ministry | Visit Us 386-658-3333 Brand and toggle get grouped for better mobile display Toggle navigation Brand Living Options Home Ownership Rental Homes Manufactured Homes Income-Based Rentals Assisted Living Skilled Nursing Rate Sheet Lifestyle Dining Activities Our Location Spiritual Life Support Services Health Services Skilled Nursing Memory Support Outpatient Services Home Care All Resources News Village Streams Podcasts About Us Ministry is the Mission Affiliations Careers Campus Map The Village Church Contact Us Careers Support ACV’s Ministry Visit Us Home > Lifestyle > Support Services Senior Support Services Available to ACV Members Service Coordinators, Housekeeping, Transportation – We’re There if You Need Us! As part of the amenities at Advent Christian Village, we provide senior support services through the Social Services Department to every member at no additional cost. Our team of professional service coordinators assist members as needed by answering questions, linking members to appropriate senior care services, assisting with transfers and offering a listening ear. Family members can also contact service coordinators on your behalf. Our senior support services take the inconvenience out of everyday life so you can spend more time enjoying the benefits of our community. For more information, call (386) 658-5400. ACV Housekeeping Services Housekeeping service is available to all Advent Christian Village members. Service can be set up on a regular basis or “as needed” to keep your home clean, safe and comfortable. Each member of our professional staff is licensed and bonded by Advent Christian Village. General housekeeping services include everything from vacuuming, mopping and cleaning bathrooms to laundry and ironing. Extra tasks may be scheduled separately, such as shampooing carpets, washing windows or packing for a move. Housekeeping gift certificates are available. You worked hard for your retirement, so our housekeeping services are designed to give you more time to enjoy our senior living amenities. For more information, call (386) 658-5374. Emergency Call Systems An emergency call system is a standard senior support service in each residence at Advent Christian Village. Members rest easy knowing that emergency services are available around the clock. A county fire and EMS station is located right on campus, and on-staff first responders answer emergency calls when they occur after hours. At Advent Christian Village, resident safety is our top priority. Transportation Services We offer additional senior care amenities, such as transportation, to members who prefer not to drive. The on-campus shuttle stops once every hour at scheduled places on campus during business hours. We also offer weekly shopping trips to drive members to local stores. During monthly excursions, we take members to nearby shopping malls and area events. Advent Christian Village also has medical transportation available to drive members to and from off-campus medical appointments. Our wheelchair-accessible van ensures that we can transport virtually any member to non-emergency medical care. Experience Meaningful Faith-Based Senior Living All the services and amenities in our faith-based senior living community are designed for a healthy and vibrant lifestyle. To learn more about the senior support services and community amenities at Advent Christian Village, call 1-800-647-3353 or contact us today. Contact Us ACV Health Through ACV Health , an outreach of Advent Christian Village, members have on-campus access to services ranging from primary and specialty care to rehabilitation and home health . Through our partner providers at Copeland Medical Center , we also offer family dentistry, audiology, podiatry, and more. Explore Our Healthcare Services

We want your giving to be meaningful to you. If you need help finding the area of ministry that means the most to you, or if you have questions about the work we do, contact Darleen Hinrichs today at DHinrichs@acvillage.net or (386) 658-5110. Advent Christian Village, a Ministry you can Trust. We take great care to ensure gifts are used for the exact purpose the donor intended. Advent Christian Village is accredited by ECFA, the Evangelical Council on Financial Accountability, and is audited annually by an independent public accounting firm. The audit report is available upon request.
